title: In case of redevelopment of an existing cinema/Theater on allocated plot, the user for the cinema/ theater may be permitted in combination with the permissible uses in Residential/Commercial zone excluding the uses of Bakery/confectionery, coal & firewood shops, maternity home, hospitals, schools, trade school & colleges
clause_text: In case of redevelopment of an existing cinema/Theater on allocated plot, the user for the cinema/ theater may be permitted in combination with the permissible uses in Residential/Commercial zone excluding the uses of Bakery/confectionery, coal & firewood shops, maternity home, hospitals, schools, trade school & colleges.
